Translations.Text: Ini i wid iumnen ad semmeen i wid ur negguni ara ussan n Oebbi, iwakken ad Ikafi agdud $ef wayen keppben
Win ixedmen ayen ilhan, i iman is; win ifalian, mgal is. Sinna, ar Mass nnwen tu$alin nnwen
Ni$ Nefka, i At Isoail, Tazmamt, uuwab, lambiyya. Noeeq iten s wayen ilhan. Nesmenyaf iten i imavalen
Nefka yasen abeggen si Lameo. Ur mgarraden, armi i ten id tusa tmusni, wa iqheo wa. Ih, Mass ik ad Ieudd garasen, ass n tnekra, $ef wayen i$ef mgarraden
Sinna, Nebbwi k deg ubrid n Lameo. Ddu degs, ur teddu akked chawi n wid ur nessin
Ih, nitni ur ak d ppawin acemma s$uo Oebbi. Imednas, ih, d imawlan wa n wa. Oebbi d Bab n wid ipeezziben
Ayagi d assekni i l$aci, d nnhaya u d aeunu i ugdud ipputebbten
Ne$ $ilen wid imooeoen iman nnsen s tucmitin, a ten Neeseb am wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, d imuddiren ne$ d lmeggtin. Dir it ueuddu nnsen
Oebbi Ixleq tamurt akked igenwan, s tidep, iwakken yal amdan ad ippuqeiii af wayen ikseb. Nitni ur pwadensen
